data.name: Idle Wasteland - Super Bundle
data.detailed_description:
Super Bundle for Idle Wasteland.

Contains:
Progression Pack - 2x currency gain forever, +25 max damage, +25 armor penetration, +25k scrap
Transmuter Drone - Drone that transmutes all scrap piles to gold every 45 seconds, giving more xp and scrap
Experience Doubler - Unlock a 25% chance to gain double exp perk + 50 biomagic tubes and 10 rabbit foot's
Bonus - 255 Nuclear Material, 3 Super Skill Points

data.short_description: Contains: Progression Pack, Transmuter Drone and the Experience Doubler!

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Microsoft® Windows 7
  • Processor: 2.33GHz or faster x86-compatible processor, or Intel Atom™ 1.6GHz or faster processor for netbook class devices
  • Memory: 128 MB RAM
  • Graphics: Integrated
  • Storage: 1 MB available space
